captions.text:
- This is like a story that
has haunted me forever.
I'll never forgive myself for this.
I was in first grade, it was recess.
We had like a lunch aide who just
controlled recess with an iron fist.

And I had to poop so bad,
I had to poop the most.
And she wouldn't let me go poop.

Finally, I can't hold it in
anymore, I poop my pants.
I'm wearing these tighty whities,
just packed to the brim in poop.

So I was like, oh, I know,
I just won't tell anyone.
There's only four hours left in the day.
So I just dealt with it.
And I'm like, yeah, I'm gonna do this.
And I sat on my poop.

And I'll never forget the
feeling of like, the poo
contouring to my little baby butt cheeks.
And my mom picked me up and I asked her

kindly to put down
newspaper on the back seat
and roll down the windows.

And I didn't say a word
the whole ride back.

- One time over the summer
a couple of years ago
I decided to go jogging.

When it was just like,
it immediately hit me,

and it was like, you're
not going to make it,

you're not going to make it,
you need to (beep) right now.
So I'm like, all right, (beep) it,
I'm just going to poop in the woods.

No one will know, it'll be
like a total big secret,
lots of people do it.

So I take off my pants,
I take off my underwear,
I squat, I start doing my business,
and I hear like this weird rustling.

And I look up and in the
distance there's just this
giant (beep) deer.
And we just make eye contact.

And I can't stop so I'm
literally just like squatting,

pooping, and staring into the
eyes of this huge-ass deer.
- I was with my dad and my mom,

and we were in a car because
we were visiting a friend,

their friend, and they
were taking forever.
So finally I was like, I can't, I can't,

I'll just go to like, I'll
just go to the carwash,
like, right here down the street.

Just take me, walk with
me, take me to the carwash.
So I'm taking my pants off.
As I'm (beep) I start to throw up.
So I'm shooting from both ends.

I throw everything in
the toilet, flush it,
it starts to overflow.
My mom continues to knock, and she's like,
"There is a little girl out here
"that needs to use the bathroom."
"Hurry up!"

I'm like, "Mom, tell her
the bathroom's broken."
And I decided to face this little girl.
So sure enough I open the door,

a big ol' 14 year old boy coming
out of the ladies restroom.

And I look at this
little girl and I'm like,
"It's out of order."
So I had a huge, huge (beep) stain.
I had to sit on towels in the car,
and then we went to my grandma's,

where I hung out with no
pants for the rest of the day.

comments.text:
How come everyone's poop stories happened when they were a kid? I find it 
hard to believe that no one has an adult poop story.  Fess up, guys.  lol﻿

comments.author: Rachel Lee

comments.text:
Ok, so my friend had to go poo in first grade(I was in the same class), and 
we had a bathroom in the classroom. One sode was for girls, one was for 
guys. So he asks to go to the bathroom, and my teacher says yes. About 5-10 
minutes later my teacher says, "Student's name*, are you still in there?" 
He sticks his head out of the bathroom door and says, "I'm taking a poopy." 
All of us had turned, and when he closes the door again, we all start 
gigling. Then my teacher yelled at the class. So yeah, that's what happened 
in first grade. ﻿

comments.text:
When i was like 6 or something, i was waiting for something (can't remember 
what) and really had to to poop. I left it to the last minute and told 
someone to watch my stuff and whatnot and tell me what happens after i come 
back. So i power walk to not look stupid to the toilets. Luckily there is a 
free cubicle and i race in. I was so desperate as i went in i closed the 
door whilst taking my trousers and whatnot down, lock the door and because 
this was a public toilet i was so desperate i couldn't put toilet paper on 
the seat to prevent diseases and all that bad stuff. So i squat over the 
toilet and start pooping. Little did i know both the toilet seats were down 
so i pooped ON the toilet seat. Once i was done i turned around and 
realised so i kinda swept the poop behind the hinges for the seat and where 
all the water goes and never spoke of it until now... ﻿

comments.text:
I don't remember having any poo incidents, but pee is really just as bad.. 
Back in the second grade, I hated/was scared of our school bathroom, so I 
always waited till I was home to do my business, but this one day, I really 
really couldn't take it, it was in "etiquette" class (the irony), but yeah, 
I had drunk too much water apparently, because the next thing I knew, I was 
peeing and I couldn't stop, it went all over the floor, I was really glad I 
was sitting at the back, but then we were playing heads down thumbs up, 
(etiquette class was a lot of fun), and I hoped no one would pick me, but 
this guy did, and when we had to stand up in the game, I didn't stand up, 
the guy who picked me told the teacher, and then she came up to me, the 
whole class joined her too, and then she saw the mess, and she was like 
"what's that, is that water or pee pee?" and I said it's water (I don't 
know what was I thinking, of course she knew it was pee) but then of 
course, she made me stand up, and smelled my skirt and everyone knew it was 
"pee pee" and as I made my way to the door everyone with her just pinched 
their noses and backed away from me, those suckers. It was extra horrible 
cause I just happened to be the loner kid who had no friends, but hey at 
least I got to go home early so it's all good XD﻿
comments.author: neenoo12345

comments.text:
Okay, so in first grade, there was this boy in our class named Cole. He was 
a pretty fucked up kid. For example, he would sit behind me during cursive, 
math and story time and just stroke and pet my hair when the teacher was 
giving instructions. So, anyways, one day, it began to smell like poop, and 
we were all curious as to why. So, we checked outside at our garden, 
nothing was rotten. But, it had soon become clear at the end of the day 
that Cole had. So, at the end of the day, we had P.E. We were playing this 
game where we rolled under each other on little scooter things. Worst day 
possible. Everyone who rolled under Cole were met with a terrible scent. 
However, one really snobby girl, who was sorta my friend, named Corey 
received a nice, moist slap to the face. Heh. That will teach her for 
teasing my friends. >:]﻿

comments.text:
I have the most horrifying of them all.

So I was in elementary school, had to poop during lunch. What do I see when 
I'm done pooping? There's no paper! I start yelling for a teacher that 
there's no paper, no one answers. I yell louder and louder. Eventually I'm 
screaming my ass off and crying in utter panic until I decide to get some 
new paper myself because I knew where it was. This was made harder by the 
HUGE piece of shit hanging on my ass that just wouldn't let go. I reach the 
place where the toilet paper is, but I'm too short to reach the paper. I 
don't know what else to do so I go towards the dining room, crying and in 
tears, pants and underwear down, and somehow with shit on my legs, and 
there the whole fucking class comes back from lunch and see me, luckily a 
teacher with them who helped me get some new toilet paper and clean my 
legs. Later a classmate kept asking "why were you having your pants down 
and walking in the corridor like that?". You know what's really fucking 
stupid? It didn't cross my mind to check the other stall for paper!﻿

comments.text:
The few times I really remember was when my 2 sisters, my mother and I got 
food poisoning from Burger King. It took a day for the sick to kick in and 
I had just gotten home from school and I was starving right? So I down 4 
kosher hot dogs and 2 hours later (We have 3 bathrooms) Everyone who got 
sick is crowding the bathrooms. I had to sit on the toilet and hold a 
bucket for at least a week until the poisoning left our bodies. Needless to 
say there were a lot of pants and undies ravaged that week. QwQ

Plus I couldn't eat hot dogs for a year because I was grossed out from 
throwing up hot dog chunks from my nose.﻿

comments.text:
The worst and only poop story I have is when I was in 6th grade. I believe 
it was near the end of the year and I was taking one of those long ass 2 
hour tests in math. It was the last period of the day and my stomach was 
just not having it. I told my teacher and she said if I felt any worse to 
jsut get up and go to the bathroom. So a while later I got up and casually 
started hobbling over to the bathroom. It was the worst (squemish people 
look away now) I threw up a little on my shoes and on the carpet legit a 
few feet from the bathroom and just threw myself on the trash can. 
Unfortunately I didn't just need to throw up.

So there I was, in a completely empty bathroom, throwing up and shitting at 
the same time. And it was a big trash can so it wasn't like I could just 
take it with me and sit on the toliet. By the time it was over my pants 
were ruined, diarrhea everywhere. I spent like an 1 hour trying to clean up 
before ever so casually going back to class and taking the rest of the 
test, didn't tell anyone, no one suspected a thing.

Yet it still haunts me.﻿
comments.author: Paris Cruz

comments.text:
A few weeks after being released from the Hospital with a diagnosis of 
Crohn's Disease, I was out running errands for my mom. My Docs had me on a 
multitude of medication. Most importantly, Iron, cuz I was Iron deficient 
in the hospital. Along with constipation, one of the side effects of the 
Iron pills I was taking was that it discolors my poop. It turned my poop 
Gray. Not brown. Gray. 
I don't normally use public bathrooms cuz Gross. But I absolutely HAD TO 
GO. So, I walked to the bathroom in my local Walmart and I let loose the 
biggest gray turds you will ever see. I couldn't even flush them down the 
toilet. One stall was already out of order, and the stall I was in was the 
only other stall in the Men's Bathroom. So the next person who had to go 
was screwed. 

I just keep thinking about the possibility of some kid walking in that 
stall, seeing that, and scarring him for life. ﻿

comments.text:
Back in high school I used to run track and cross country. This one day 
there was no practice, so I figured its a nice day, so Id might as well go 
run on my own. As Im running back to the school, I felt my stomach 
rumbling, so I figured I had to poop but Id might as well try to hold it 
till I get to school. (I was running on this trail that was converted from 
an old train tracks into a running/bike trail) As time went on, the feeling 
intensified more and more till walking became hard!! So I look in front and 
behind me to make sure nobody was around, coast was clear. So I dropped my 
shorts, did my business, used my sock to wipe, and went on with running 
back to the school.. About 50 to 100 feet from the scene a guy comes from 
in front of me, we pass, and as he goes up to the scene, I hear 'OH, WTF 
DID THIS SHIT!!!' He was LIVID!!! So all of a sudden something came over 
me, I started to haul ass cause I knew I did it and didnt want to get 
caught. As I flew back to the school, I got off the trail, ran up a street, 
and look back. Sure enough the guy must not have thought it was me or didnt 
want to pursue me because I didnt even see the guy after that (Nor did I 
ever see him after as the track/cross country team ran on that stretch of 
trail often)﻿

Ok so this is a story my friend told me that happened to her. She's a 
manager at Starbucks and one day this women came in with her son to use the 
bathroom and they only had two one person bathrooms. The lady let her son 
go in and he had been in there for a really long time so she asked my 
friend if she could open the door because apparently her son had special 
needs and she was worried about him. So just as my friend is about to 
unlock the door the guy comes out still pulling up his pants and leaves. 
And he had literally left shit explosion in the bathroom, it was everywhere 
on the walls, the floor and even the ceiling. My friend being the amazing 
person she is didn't want to make the other employees clean it up so she 
cleaned the whole bathroom herself. ﻿

comments.text:
one time when i was around 16, i had to poop but i was in the shower. I 
thought i would just do it in there, as i thought it would be diarrhea and 
it would just go down the drain like pee. It wasn't diarrhea. I gave birth 
to two big pieces of poop, and it started disintegrating with the water 
from the shower, but not enough to make it go through the drain. One piece 
blocked the drain so i ended up standing in a poopy water lake, trying to 
push my stool down the drain with my foot. At that moment my mom comes in 
the bathroom and she's like ''It smells like shit in here'' to which i 
reply i had taken a dump before my shower. She leaves. I had to cut my 
shower short, use some toilet paper to take the poop pieces blocking the 
drain and place them in the toilet, rinse the shower for the remaining shit 
particles and febreze the shit out (literally) of the bathroom. I'm never 
EVER doing that again.﻿

comments.text:
about 10-15 years ago before i got my car i had to walk to town if i needed 
anything, my mum always said if you need to poop and are finding it 
difficult, go for a long walk that will get you going and with this in mind 
i tried not to walk in town more than once a week because in my town there 
seem's to be something wrong with the water as i have very soft poop while 
living here but if i visit another town for more than a day i'll have 
normal poop.
the day in question i found late in the day that i had run out of something 
so i walked in town as fast as i could (not a good idea in this case) 
before the shops shut and i suddenly felt a strong urge to poop but 
unfortunately due to some recent vandalizing the main town public toilet 
was closed after 5 pm, my mother lived around the corner from the shops but 
i knew i would not make it so i tried for the other public toilet that was 
a little closer, i made it to the door and was uttering under my breath 
"Yes yes yes" i made it into the stall and before i had gotten my underwear 
partially down, there was an almighty poop explosion which splatted the 
back of the toilet the seat the floor and my shoes, unfortunately i had to 
sit in the poop as the rest of what my bowel contained dribbled into the 
bowl. my under wear did not survive they were completely soaked so i had to 
throw them out and the only place i could find was the used paper towel bin 
which was full to the brim so i buried them in there as deep as i could, i 
then had to clean up the mess thankfully there was enough toilet paper to 
do so but one problem i found was, whoever laid the floor did not grout the 
tiles so i could not get to the poop in the grooves. I wiped up my shoes 
and my butt the best i could and did my shopping without under wear ( 
thankfully my dresses have long skirts) and smelling faintly of poop.﻿

PERFECT! THIS HAPPENED TODAY!

Today I was having major diarrhea issues and it also happened to be the day

she would never let me go. We start running and I hold it in as long as I 
can and about 3 minutes in to the run I poop myself. I think, "I have to 
finish this!" I ran the next 19 minutes in horror and disgust and when I 
finally finish I wait until we're excused. I go to the locker rooms and act 
as if I were going to the bathroom to change clothes and I take of my pants 
and underwear and just wear only my pants. As for my underwear, I emptied 
my pencil box  and just dumped my underwear in there. I come out as we head 
for 4th period and I tell my friends that I just need to throw something 
away. The next day I bring a new pencil box and 2 of my friends come up to

back away, than started running. I never talked to them after.﻿

comments.author: robert juan

comments.text:
I used to use a lot of narcotic painkillers and as a result, I suffered 
pretty bad constipation. I would routinely go a week, week and a half in 
between bowel movements and then skip using the pain killers for a day and 
have the whole week's worth of poop come out of me all at once. Now, my 
toilet has problems and it clogs at the drop of a hat, so the first time I 
had one of these gargantuan craps I had already flushed once, sat back 
down, filled the toilet well above the water line again, so I got up to 
flush a second time, and to my horror, the toilet had clogged. It not only 
clogged, but it got stuck running, so it overflowed as well... while it was 
filled with a mound of shit the size of my head. Mind you I still had to 
poop, but that was the least of my worries now. At this point there was 
shit/piss water all over the floor and I was desperately trying to unclog 
my toilet. I had already removed the back part and stopped it running. So 
here I was, elbow deep inside the toilet, having given up on the plunger 
long ago, completely naked, covered in freezing cold shit/piss water 
standing in the grossest puddle you can imagine. Finally after 20 minutes 
of struggling I managed to tame the mighty clog and the toilet finally 
drained. So I remounted the toilet and filled the bowl with shit 2 more 
times. Thankfully the toilet didn't protest these last 2 times. When I 
finished, I cleaned up the awful mess in my bathroom and then proceeded to 
take the greatest feeling shower I've ever taken in my life. To this day I 
use buckets filled with water to flush my toilet just in case it decides to 
get clogged again.﻿
comments.author: Nothing\

comments.text:

tears rolling down my cheeks. When I was done I went to the bathroom and it 
was a port a potty type one and my dumbass instead of throwing my shit 
undies in the endless hole of crap I LEFT THEM BY THE FUCKING TOILET. I 
came out crying... long story short I ended up winning camper of the week 
for cramping my pants because my leader felt bad for me. I switched schools
